summary: The implementation substantially fulfills the BuildRequest. All major requirements appear to be addressed: a Login component was created, Layout conditionally renders based on authentication, a logout button was added, backend data structures were modified to store exercises and sessions per-user using Principal IDs, backend methods now scope data by caller Principal, and frontend query hooks check authentication state. The diff shows comprehensive changes to backend and frontend files. However, some evidence is limited due to truncation.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) that migrates old global data structures to new per-user structures
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention implementing a migration system or preserving existing data during the transition from global to per-user storage. The migration module appears to be an implementation detail beyond the stated requirements.
